title: Scarlet Siege
description: Gary Celdom is a veteran detective with over 25 years experience. However, when he decides to attend a fan convention as part of a short vacation, it turns into a hostage situation. With the help of his partner, a friend from a previous case, and the spiritual guidance of his former fiancee, can Detective Celdom apprehend the captors and enjoy his weekend off?
author: Douglas J. McLeod
